definitions.definition: A complex vowel sound that begins with the sound of one vowel and ends with the sound of another vowel, in the same syllable .
A diaphoneme realized as a two-target vowel in some but not necessarily all dialects.

main_definition: ( phonetics ) A complex vowel sound that begins with the sound of one vowel and ends with the sound of another vowel, in the same syllable .
secondary_definitions: ( phonetics ) A diaphoneme realized as a two-target vowel in some but not necessarily all dialects.
( rare ) A vowel digraph or ligature .
